languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, в моем святилище столь дерзкое обращение к духу машины неприемлемо вне зависимости от того, насколько критична ситуация".
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I will not tolerate such disrespectful behaviour toward the machine spirits in my sanctum, no matter how dire the circumstances may be."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, в моем святилище столь дерзкое обращение к духу машины неприемлемо вне зависимости от того, насколько критична ситуация".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I will not tolerate such disrespectful behaviour toward machine spirits in my sanctum no matter how dire the circumstances may be."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I will not tolerate such disrespectful behaviour toward machine spirits in my sanctum no matter how dire the circumstances may be."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I will not tolerate such disrespectful behaviour toward the machine spirits in my sanctum, no matter how dire the circumstances may be."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I will not tolerate such disrespectful behaviour toward the machine spirits in my sanctum, no matter how dire the circumstances may be."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I will not tolerate such disrespectful behaviour toward the machine spirits in my sanctum, no matter how dire the circumstances may be."

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich werde ein derart respektloses Verhalten gegenüber den Maschinengeistern in meinem Sanctum nicht dulden, egal, wie erst die Lage auch sein mag."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I will not tolerate such disrespectful behaviour toward the machine spirits in my sanctum, no matter how dire the circumstances may be."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich werde ein derart respektloses Verhalten gegenüber den Maschinengeistern in meinem Sanctum nicht dulden, egal, wie erst die Lage auch sein mag."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, je ne tolérerai pas une attitude aussi irrespectueuse envers les esprits de la machine dans mon sanctum, aussi désespérée que puisse être la situation. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I will not tolerate such disrespectful behaviour toward the machine spirits in my sanctum, no matter how dire the circumstances may be."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, je ne tolérerai pas une attitude aussi irrespectueuse envers les esprits de la machine dans mon sanctum, aussi désespérée que puisse être la situation. »

languages.text: “大人，无论情况有多么危急，我都不允许任何人在我的圣殿中，对机魂做出如此不敬的行为。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I will not tolerate such disrespectful behaviour toward the machine spirits in my sanctum, no matter how dire the circumstances may be."

traits.locale_text: “大人，无论情况有多么危急，我都不允许任何人在我的圣殿中，对机魂做出如此不敬的行为。”

languages.text: 「陛下、自分のサンクトゥムにおいては機械精霊に対するいかなる非礼も許容しません。いかに逼迫した状況下であってもです」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I will not tolerate such disrespectful behaviour toward the machine spirits in my sanctum, no matter how dire the circumstances may be."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、私のサンクトゥムにおいては機械精霊に対するいかなる非礼も許容しない。いかに逼迫した状況下であっても」
「陛下、自分のサンクトゥムにおいては機械精霊に対するいかなる非礼も許容しません。いかに逼迫した状況下であってもです」

languages.text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, por muy terribles que sean las circunstancias, no toleraré un comportamiento tan irrespetuoso hacia los espíritus máquina en mi santuario».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I will not tolerate such disrespectful behaviour toward the machine spirits in my sanctum, no matter how dire the circumstances may be."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, por muy terribles que sean las circunstancias, no toleraré un comportamiento tan irrespetuoso hacia los espíritus máquina en mi santuario».

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, durum ne kadar vahim olursa olsun, mabedimde makine ruhlarına böyle saygısızca davranılmasını hoşgöremem."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I will not tolerate such disrespectful behaviour toward the machine spirits in my sanctum, no matter how dire the circumstances may be."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leyd} Hazretleri, durum ne kadar vahim olursa olsun, kutağımda makine ruhlarına karşı böylesine saygısızca bir davranışta bulunulmasına tolerans gösteremem."
